Title Question Answer Actions
{{ card.title }} {{ card.question }} {{ card.answer }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { FlashcardService } from 'src/app/services/FlashCardService'; import { Flashcard } from 'src/app/models/FlashCard'; @Component({ selector: 'app-flashcard-list', templateUrl: './FlashCardList.html', styleUrls: ['./FlashCardList.scss'], }) export class FlashCardListComponent implements OnInit { flashcards: Flashcard[] = []; constructor( private flashcardService: FlashcardService, private router: Router ) {} ngOnInit() { this.loadFlashcards(); } loadFlashcards() { this.flashcardService.getFlashcards().subscribe((data) => { this.flashcards = data; }); } navigateToAdd() { this.router.navigate(['/add-flashcard']); // Adjust the route as per your routing configuration } navigateToEdit(flashcardId: number | undefined) { if (flashcardId !== undefined) { this.router.navigate(['/edit-flashcard', flashcardId]); } } deleteFlashcard(flashcardId: number | undefined) { if (flashcardId !== undefined && confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this flashcard?')) { this.flashcardService.deleteFlashcard(flashcardId).subscribe(() => { this.flashcards = this.flashcards.filter(flashcard => flashcard.id !== flashcardId); }); } } }
